fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Remove a player’s existence from the game (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Removed players will be erased from the game, along with their role, death announcement, will, and just anything generally relating to their existence
-Any past mentions of their name will also be deleted
-If anyone attempts to say the removed player’s name, they will be blackmailed (effective immediately)
-You learn the faction of the removed player

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see your removed player’s faction lose
